title: Ticket #334: Meaning of MAX_JOBS_RUNNING inconsistent
description:
The type of jobs constrained by the config parameter MAX_JOBS_RUNNING is inconsistent. The manual says it applies to all job universes except the grid universe. The negotiation code in the schedd follows this policy. However, the code in Scheduler::timeout() to preempt shadows if over the limit does not count scheduler or local universe jobs.

Thus, the schedd will let up to MAX_JOBS_RUNNING shadows run (i.e. not counting scheduler/local universe), but it will negotiate for fewer jobs (i.e. counting scheduler/local universe).

We need to pick one meaning and make all of the relevant code honor it.
